line.originaltext: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cubed
1 cup sliced carrots
1 cup frozen green peas
1/2 cup sliced celery
1/3 cup butter
1/3 cup chopped onion
1/3 cup all-purpose flour
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon black pepper
1/4 teaspoon celery seed
1 3/4 cups chicken broth
2/3 cup milk
2 (9 inch) unbaked pie crusts
Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C.)
Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C.)
In a saucepan, combine chicken, carrots, peas, and celery.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing3}, ing13, "chicken mix", "")

line.originaltext: In a saucepan, combine chicken, carrots, peas, and celery.
In a saucepan, combine chicken, carrots, peas, and celery.
Add water to cover and boil for 15 minutes.
Add water to cover and boil for 15 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing13, t1, ing14, "cooked chicken", "boil for 15 minutes")

line.originaltext: Remove from heat, drain and set aside.
Remove from heat, drain and set aside.
In the saucepan over medium heat, cook onions in butter until soft and translucent.
In the saucepan over medium heat, cook onions in butter until soft and translucent.
line.annotation: cook(ing15, t1, ing16, "cooked onion", "over medium heat until onion is soft and transluscent")

line.originaltext: In the saucepan over medium heat, cook onions in butter until soft and translucent.
Stir in flour, salt, pepper, and celery seed.
line.annotation: combine({ing16, ing6, ing7, ing8, ing9}, ing17, "seasoned onion", "")

line.originaltext: Slowly stir in chicken broth and milk.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing11, ing17}, ing18, "liquid onion", "slowly stir in chicken broth and milk")

line.originaltext: Simmer over medium-low heat until thick.
line.annotation: cook(ing18, t1, ing19, "cooked liquid onion", "simmer over medium-low heat until thick")

line.originaltext: Simmer over medium-low heat until thick.
Remove from heat and set aside.
line.annotation: leave(ing19,"remove from heat and set aside")

line.originaltext: Place the chicken mixture in bottom pie crust.
line.annotation: separate(ing12, ing20, "bottom pie crust", ing21, "top pie crust", "")

line.originaltext: Place the chicken mixture in bottom pie crust.
line.annotation: combine({ing14, ing20}, ing22, "pied chicken", "place the chicken mixture in bottom pie crust")

line.originaltext: Pour hot liquid mixture over.
line.annotation: combine({ing19, ing22}, ing23, "soup chicken", "pour hot liquid mixture over")

line.originaltext: Cover with top crust, seal edges, and cut away excess dough.
line.annotation: combine({ing21, ing23}, ing24, "pie", "cover with top crust, seal edges")

line.originaltext: Cover with top crust, seal edges, and cut away excess dough.
line.annotation: do(ing24, , ing25, "trimmed pie", "cut away excess dough")

line.originaltext: Make several small slits in the top to allow steam to escape.
line.annotation: do(ing25, , ing26, "cut pie", "make several small slits in the top")

line.originaltext: Bake in the preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes, or until pastry is golden brown and filling is bubbly.
line.annotation: cook(ing26, t0, ing27, "baked pie", "bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until pastry is golden brown and filling is bubbly")

line.originaltext: Bake in the preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes, or until pastry is golden brown and filling is bubbly.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing27,"pastry is golden brown and filling is bubbly")

line.originaltext: Cool for 10 minutes before serving.
Cool for 10 minutes before serving.
